Module.Content:
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://mixitest.communityfactory.net/static/cmn/js/mixios.canvas.js"></script>
     
       <script type="text/javascript">
	        var canvas = mixios.application.newCanvas('http://mixitest.communityfactory.net', 'millionminds');
	        
	        //default debug is disabled
	        canvas.enableDebug(true);
	        
	        //default height is 1000
	        canvas.setHeight(1000);
	       
	        //let's go
	        canvas.start();
       </script>
